quote: Life goes by fast. Enjoy it. Calm down. It's all funny. – Joan Rivers
fact: Mozart wrote the nursery rhyme `twinkle, twinkle, little star` at the age of 5.
joke: Someone asked me, what's the ninth letter of the alphabet? It was a complete guess, but I was right.
